question: ひどい
sourceMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an <ja>い</ja> on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>cruel</kanji>? <vocabulary>Cruel</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>awful</vocabulary>.
